name: Jumble Golf: 150 Game Courses Challenge!
description:
You can enjoy the golf more than 150 exciting courses with various balls!

In this game, you must aim the cup by using 10 various things (like cans, soccer ball, tire, steel drum, etc.) instead of golf ball.

There're 3 amusing holes and more than 150 types of courses.
(For example, there're shoot up and down courses,
and an island that moves and spins.)

・There're 3 simple golf clubs!
"Normal"
It's a normal club. You can use it many time.
However, there is a "miss" in Power Reel. Therefore, it isn't very good to use it.
"Power"
You can hit the ball further.
"Special"
You can hit the ball where you're aiming at.

・Easy shot with simple control.
Just pull & release cursor to the direction you want to strike!
You can adjust your shot power by the strength you pull.

・Spin the ball and control it!
By flicking the ball, you can put hook, slice, and backspin.

Let's aim to clear all holes!
